name: IS IT?
description:
IS IT?

Top Down Shooter Game

You're A Hacker Along With Your Virtual Pet

Trying To Save Humanity From Rogue AI

Avoid "The Viruses"
Kill "The Viruses" With Your Pet
Grow Your Pet
Defeat The AI

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

W, A, S, D To Move Player

Arrow Keys To Control Pet Movement

Press Any Key To Continue

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Created For The Purpose of "No Excuse Game Jam 20- OCT-2020" 

Theme:

- Choose A Path

- Build It, then Use It

- Evolve

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
